activities:
Tetra Recycling, Inc is an environmentally friendly company specializing in the recovery of silver from x-ray, lithographic and industrial films, sludge and photographic papers.  

Recycle X-Ray films, lithographic films, industrial film and the associated sludges, emulsions and waste stream associated with these types of silver bearing films.  We also take in medical records and shred these and the films to meet HIPAA requirements in the United States to non-legible forms.
industrysector: Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)Health Care Services - (HCS)Non-Ferrous Metals - (NFM)Plastic Materials & Resin - (PMR)
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
